name: Amor Ex Machina
description:
In a time where the division between man and machine has shifted...

    When cyberpunk is real....
    The Robots Revolt.
                      
    This is a game about being and kissing them.
    by @aetherkids and @jesspretend (twitter)
                      For CyberpunkJam 2019. We missed it.

This is an opening game jam game in prep for a different game we are working on in a longer term way. The protagonist, their best friend, and some of the characters will show up in that game. This is also an exercise in worldbuilding and working together! And the power of friendship. 

🌈🌈🌈🌈😘

talk to us about our game @aetherkids and @jesspretend
